SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_INTERACTION_GETCATEGORYGROUP
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Used to retrieve a table of the interaction categories for a specific view (child, sponsor, sponsorship, ...)
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTION_GETCATEGORYGROUP ( @categoryGroup nvarchar(50) ) returns @interactioncategories table ( interactionCategoryID uniqueidentifier ) with execute as caller as begin if lower(@categoryGroup) = 'sponsor' insert @interactioncategories select ID as interactionCategoryID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower(NAME) in ('child change notifications', 'misc processing', 'project sponsorship', 'prospect welcome', 'sponsor welcome', 'sponsorship cancellation', 'sponsorship delinquency', 'sponsorship rate increase', 'sponsorship retention', 'sponsorship transfers', 'sympathy and cancellation' ) else if lower(@categoryGroup) = 'child correspondence' insert @interactioncategories select ID as interactionCategoryID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower(NAME) = 'child correspondence' else if lower(@categoryGroup) = 'child' insert @interactioncategories select ID as interactionCategoryID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower(NAME) in ('child field memo', 'child letters') else if lower(@categoryGroup) = 'revenue' insert @interactioncategories select ID as interactionCategoryID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower(NAME) = 'revenue'
return end
